divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking around my property after noon on the 17th of may this year 2010 and looked up between my trees... from the east of my field of vision appeared a round bright-white colored object moving due west toward Ft Leavenworth Ks. I am in a flight pattern near KCI airport and expected to hear sound (as all the craft I see here do) but there was none. At that altitude it appeared to be at least a mile high (if it were a plane the same size) it moved at a constant speed across the sky until it disappeared from my field of vision. It took about 15 seconds to clear my sight and was perfectly round from my vantage point. Oddly enough it was in the same flight pattern as commonly seen com-trails that are constantly in the same area here west of Kansas City.
Summary: Object at higher altitude moves slowly
trends: There have been 134 other sightings in Kansas City
There was one other sighting in Kansas City on or around May 17th 2010
